INFO:(c)JRDVSOFT Abril 2017

The Service(Accesibility) must be enabled before start working
Once clicked please enable de EZGestures Service and then come back to Start

You can choose to see the panel in Black to notice exactly where it is located to make the Gesture easier to you,once you got it, I will recommend to leave it transparent..but it is up 2 u!!!
